metadata.title: CVE-2022-2160 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Insufficient policy enforcement in DevTools in Google Chrome on Windowsprior to 103.0.5060.53 allowed an attacker who convinced a user to installa malicious extension to obtain potentially sensitive information from auser's local files via a crafted HTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
